items.titolo: Best VPNs for streaming of 2026: Expert tested and reviewed

items.titolo: AMD's Ryzen AI 400 series includes the first Copilot+ desktop CPU — Team Red refreshes Zen 5 APUs and Strix Halo
items.descrizione: AMD’s new Ryzen AI 400 ‘Gorgon Point’ APUs are primarily driven by a clock speed bump, featuring similar silicon as the previous generation otherwise.

items.titolo: Use Google AI Overview for health advice? It's 'really dangerous,' investigation finds
items.descrizione: Google's AI in Search served up false and misleading health information, according to an investigation by The Guardian.
